name: requirements.txt

features.name: Flask Framework
features.description: Web framework for building the backend application

features.name: Flask-SQLAlchemy
features.description: Toolkit for working with SQLAlchemy ORM in Flask applications

features.name: Flask-Migrate
features.description: Extension for handling database migrations with Flask-SQLAlchemy

features.name: Requests
features.description: HTTP library for making API requests and interacting with external services

features.name: Flask-Cors
features.description: Extension for handling Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) in Flask

features.name: Flask-Login
features.description: Extension for implementing user authentication and session management in Flask

code:
# List of required dependencies for the CRM backend Flask for Facebook leads project
Flask
Flask-SQLAlchemy
Flask-Migrate
Requests
Flask-Cors
Flask-Login
file_instruction: This file contains a list of required dependencies for the CRM backend Flask for Facebook leads project. Use this file to install the necessary Python packages and libraries by running 'pip install -r requirements.txt'
